cnd8:12.3: yānīdhatthi → yānipatthi (bj, sya-all); yāni atthi (si, mr)
cnd8:14.3: bahuratano → pahūtaratano (bj) | sāgarūpamo → sāgarasamo (mr) | bhāvito → bhāvitatto (bj) | sa danto”ti → sudantoti (sya-all)
cnd8:16.3: paneva → panetaṃ (sya-all) | appatiṭṭhitacitto → appatiṭṭhīnacitto (sya-all) | alīnamanaso → ādinamanaso (sya-all)
cnd8:28.5: jātassūpanibandhakaṃ → jātassupanibandhataṃ (bj) | parādheyyakaṃ → parādheyyataṃ (bj) | ḍāho → ḍaho (bj, sya-all)
cnd8:44.2: kittitaṃ → akitti taṃ (sya-all) | pakittitaṃ → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all potthakesu | paññapitaṃ → paññāpitaṃ (mr)
cnd8:46.10: palāpo → lāpo palāpo (sya-all) | lālappanā lālappitattaṃ → lālappāyanā lālappāyittaṃ (cck); lālappāyanā lālappāyitattaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
cnd8:64.14: phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule → phoṭṭhabbe kule (bj, sya-all, csp1ed)
cnd8:64.16: loke vesā visattikā → yā sā loke visattikā (sya-all)
cnd8:67.2: byappathaṃ → byapathaṃ (sya-all, mr) | desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ → desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ (bj); desanaṃ anusandhiṃ (sya-all)
cnd8:74.2: anāgataṃ → uddhaṃ vuccati anāgataṃ (bj, cck, mr); uddhanti vuccati anāgataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
cnd8:80.8: kathāhaṃ → kadāhaṃ (sya-all) | anuggaṇheyyan”ti → anugaṇheyyanti (bj) | appaṭivānī → appaṭivāni (mr)
cnd8:85.2: byappathaṃ → byapathaṃ (sya-all) | anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ → desanā anusiṭṭhiṃ (bj); desanaṃ anusandhiṃ abhinandāmīti (sya-all)
cnd8:11.5: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi → ñāṇaṃ …pe… sabbavedamaticca vedagū soti (sya-all)
cnd8:115.6: bandhe vibandhe ābandhe → baddhe vibaddhe ābaddhe (bj) | palibuddhe → paḷibuddhe (bj) | phoṭayitvā → mocayitvā (sya-all)
